entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. Harry is described as reaching up and grabbing Quirrell's face, showing his bravery and quick thinking.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: A character who is possessed by Voldemort. Quirrell is described as trying to throw Harry off and screaming in pain, showing his struggle against Harry's hold.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story. Voldemort is described as yelling 'KILL HIM! KILL HIM!' and trying to take control of Quirrell, showing his evil intentions.

entities.name: the snitch
entities.description: A golden object that glints above Harry's head. The Snitch is described as something that Harry tries to catch, but his arms are too heavy.

relationships.description: Harry grabbed Quirrell's face by instinct, showing his quick thinking and bravery.
Harry held onto Quirrell to keep him in enough pain to stop him from doing a curse, showing his determination and resourcefulness.
Voldemort possessed Quirrell's body, using it to try and take control of Harry, showing his evil intentions.
